title: Freelance Services Agreement
description: Professional services agreement for freelancers and independent contractors. Defines scope, payment terms, deliverables, and intellectual property rights.

placeholders.name: client_name
placeholders.label: Client Name
placeholders.placeholder: Legal name of the client company

placeholders.name: project_description
placeholders.label: Project Description
placeholders.placeholder: Detailed description of services to be provided

content.html:
FREELANCE SERVICES AGREEMENT

This Freelance Services Agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into as of {{start_date}} (the "Effective Date") by and between:

Client:
{{client_name}}
{{client_address}}

and

Freelancer:
{{freelancer_name}}
{{freelancer_address}}

1. SERVICES

Freelancer agrees to provide the following services (the "Services"):

{{project_description}}

2. DELIVERABLES

Freelancer shall deliver the following items to Client (the "Deliverables"):

{{deliverables}}

3. TIMELINE

Services shall commence on {{start_date}} and be completed by {{completion_date}} (the "Completion Date").

4. COMPENSATION

Client shall pay Freelancer a total fee of ${{total_fee}} (the "Total Fee") according to the following schedule: {{payment_schedule}}.

5. INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR

Freelancer is an independent contractor, not an employee of Client. Freelancer is responsible for all taxes, insurance, and other obligations associated with self-employment.

6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

Upon receipt of full payment, Freelancer assigns all rights, title, and interest in the Deliverables to Client. Prior to full payment, Freelancer retains all rights.

7. CONFIDENTIALITY

Freelancer agrees to keep confidential all non-public information of Client and not to disclose such information to any third party.

8. REVISIONS

Client shall be entitled to two rounds of revisions to the Deliverables at no additional charge. Additional revisions shall be billed at Freelancer's standard hourly rate.

9. TERMINATION

Either party may terminate this Agreement with 7 days written notice. Client shall pay for all work completed prior to termination.

10. WARRANTY

Freelancer warrants that Deliverables will be free from defects and will conform to the specifications outlined in this Agreement.

11. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

Freelancer's total liability under this Agreement shall not exceed the Total Fee paid by Client.

12. GOVERNING LAW

This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California.

Client
Freelancer
Date

sample_data.client_address: 500 Business Park Drive, San Diego, CA 92101
sample_data.project_description: Design and develop a responsive e-commerce website with product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration
sample_data.payment_schedule: 30% upon signing, 40% at midpoint, 30% upon completion
sample_data.deliverables: 1. Website design mockups, 2. Fully functional website, 3. User documentation, 4. 30-day post-launch support
